Pinyin1: jǐnzhāng shénme a ， nǐ bùshì shàngguò hǎo jǐcì wǔtái le ma ？
Chinese1: 紧张什么啊，你不是上过好几次舞台了吗？
Translate1: Why are you nervous, haven't you been on stage several times?

Pinyin1: nǐ jí shénme jí ， hái zǎo zhe ne 。
Chinese1: 你急什么急，还早着呢。
Translate1: Why are you in a hurry, it's still early.

Pinyin1: nǐ kàn shénme kàn ， méijiàn guò měinǚ a ？
Chinese1: 你看什么看，没见过美女啊？
Translate1: What are you looking at, have you never seen a beautiful woman?

Pinyin1: nǐ máng shénme máng ？
Chinese1: 你忙什么忙？
Translate1: What are you busy with?

Pinyin1: wǒ zuìjìn máng dé hěn ， měitiān dōu yào jiābān 。
Chinese1: 我最近忙得很，每天都要加班。
Translate1: I've been very busy recently and have to work overtime every day.

Pinyin1: gāofēngqī lùshang dǔdé hěn ， wǒ jiànyì nǐ shàngbān zuòdìtiě 。
Chinese1: 高峰期路上堵得很，我建议你上班坐地铁。
Translate1: The road is very congested during peak hours, so I suggest you take the subway to work.

Pinyin1: tā zhège rén zìsī dé hěn ， cóngláibù wéi biéren kǎolǜ 。
Chinese1: 他这个人自私得很，从来不为别人考虑。
Translate1: He is very selfish and never considers others.

Pinyin1: zhè tiáo niúzǎikù hǎoxiàng duǎn le diǎnr 。
Chinese1: 这条牛仔裤好像短了点儿。
Translate1: These jeans seem to be a little short.

Pinyin1: nàgè dìfāng lí wǒjiā yuǎn le yīdiǎnr 。
Chinese1: 那个地方离我家远了一点儿。
Translate1: That place is a little far from my home.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn chènshān xiǎo le diǎnr ， wǒ xiǎng huàn yījiàn 。
Chinese1: 这件衬衫小了点儿，我想换一件。
Translate1: This shirt is a little too small, I want to change it.

Pinyin1: tā gěi de zhège hóngbāo hǎoxiàng shǎo le diǎnr 。
Chinese1: 他给的这个红包好像少了点儿。
Translate1: The red envelope he gave seemed a little short.

Pinyin1: tābà shì dà lǎobǎn ， yǒudeshì qián 。
Chinese1: 他爸是大老板，有的是钱。
Translate1: His father is a big boss and has plenty of money.

Pinyin1: tā shì quánzhí māma ， yǒudeshì shíjiān 。
Chinese1: 她是全职妈妈，有的是时间。
Translate1: She is a full-time mother and has plenty of time.

Pinyin1: wǒ yīgè dà nánrén ， yǒudeshì lìqì 。
Chinese1: 我一个大男人，有的是力气。
Translate1: I am a big man with plenty of strength.

Pinyin1: shànghǎi zhème dà de chéngshì ， gōngzuò jīhuì yǒudeshì 。
Chinese1: 上海这么大的城市，工作机会有的是。
Translate1: In a city as big as Shanghai, there are plenty of job opportunities.

Pinyin1: zhège rén wǒ kànleyòukàn ， háishi juéde wǒ bù rènshi tā 。
Chinese1: 这个人我看了又看，还是觉得我不认识他。
Translate1: I've looked and looked at this guy, and I still don't think I know him.

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎngleyòuxiǎng ， háishi juéde bùnéng zhèyàng zuò 。
Chinese1: 我想了又想，还是觉得不能这样做。
Translate1: I thought about it and thought about it, but I still couldn't do it.

Pinyin1: tā zhǎo le yòu zhǎo ， háishi méi zhǎodào tā de qiánbāo 。
Chinese1: 他找了又找，还是没找到他的钱包。
Translate1: He searched and searched, but still couldn't find his wallet.

Pinyin1: tā xiǎngleyòuxiǎng ， háishi bù tóngyì 。
Chinese1: 他想了又想，还是不同意。
Translate1: He thought and thought, but still disagreed.

Pinyin1: wǒmen wèn le yòu wèn ， tā jiùshì bùshuō 。
Chinese1: 我们问了又问，她就是不说。
Translate1: We asked and asked and she just didn't say anything.

Pinyin1: wǒ dōu néng wénjiàn miànbāo de xiāngwèi 。
Chinese1: 我都能闻见面包的香味。
Translate1: I can smell the aroma of bread.

Pinyin1: wǒ duì nǐ tài liǎojiě le ， wǒ dōu néng zhīdào nǐ xià yībù yào zuò shénme 。
Chinese1: 我对你太了解了，我都能知道你下一步要做什么。
Translate1: I know you too well to know what you're going to do next.

Pinyin1: tā dōu zhème shuō le ， nǐ hái hǎoyìsi zài zhǎo tā bāngmáng ？
Chinese1: 他都这么说了，你还好意思再找他帮忙？
Translate1: He said so, you still have the nerve to ask him for help?

Pinyin1: lái dōu lái le ， jiù xiān biéjí zhe zǒu le 。
Chinese1: 来都来了，就先别急着走了。
Translate1: It's all here, so don't rush to leave.

Pinyin1: dōu guài nǐ ， chūmén bùdài sǎn 。
Chinese1: 都怪你，出门不带伞。
Translate1: It's all your fault, you didn't bring an umbrella when you went out.

Pinyin1: dōu shì nǐ ， hài wǒ pǎo zhème yuǎn 。
Chinese1: 都是你，害我跑这么远。
Translate1: It was you who made me run so far.

Pinyin1: dōu yuàn nǐ ， bù tíqián dìnghǎo zuòwèi 。
Chinese1: 都怨你，不提前订好座位。
Translate1: I blame you for not booking a seat in advance.

Pinyin1: zhège xiǎohái hái zhēn cōngming ！
Chinese1: 这个小孩还真聪明！
Translate1: This kid is really smart!

Pinyin1: hái dà lǎobǎn ne ， yīdiǎn yě bù dàfāng 。
Chinese1: 还大老板呢，一点也不大方。
Translate1: And the big boss is not generous at all.

Pinyin1: dōu guài nǐ ， nǐ hái shēngqì ne 。
Chinese1: 都怪你，你还生气呢。
Translate1: It's all your fault, you're still angry.

Pinyin1: tā nàme yǒuqián ， hái zàihu zhèdiǎn qián ma ？
Chinese1: 他那么有钱，还在乎这点钱吗？
Translate1: He is so rich, does he still care about this little money?

Pinyin1: zhèzhǒng rén nǐ hái xiāngxìn ma ？
Chinese1: 这种人你还相信吗？
Translate1: Do you still believe this kind of person?

Pinyin1: guòqī de niúnǎi nǐ hái hē ma ？
Chinese1: 过期的牛奶你还喝吗？
Translate1: Do you still drink expired milk?

Pinyin1: jīntiān zhème rè ， nǐ hái chūmén ma ？
Chinese1: 今天这么热，你还出门吗？
Translate1: It's so hot today, are you still going out?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ shì tājiā ， tā zǒnghuì huílai de 。
Chinese1: 这里是他家，他总会回来的。
Translate1: This is his home, and he will always come back.

Pinyin1: zánmen zǒngděi xiǎnggèbànfǎ a 。
Chinese1: 咱们总得想个办法啊。
Translate1: We have to figure out a way.

Pinyin1: bùguǎn fāshēng le shénme ， rén zǒngyào chīfàn bā 。
Chinese1: 不管发生了什么，人总要吃饭吧。
Translate1: No matter what happens, people have to eat.

Pinyin1: tā shì nǐ bàba ， nǐ zǒngyào lǐmào yīdiǎn bā 。
Chinese1: 他是你爸爸，你总要礼貌一点吧。
Translate1: He's your father, you have to be polite.

Pinyin1: nǐ ná le rénjiā de qián ， zǒngděi bāng rénjiā zuòshì bā 。
Chinese1: 你拿了人家的钱，总得帮人家做事吧。
Translate1: If you take other people's money, you have to do things for them.

Pinyin1: nǐmen zhījiān de liánxì zhème shǎo ， kànqǐlai zǒng bù xiàngshì yījiārén 。
Chinese1: 你们之间的联系这么少，看起来总不像是一家人。
Translate1: With so little connection between you, it never seems like family.

Pinyin1: tā zhème dà niánjì le ， wǒmen zǒng bùnéng ràng tā yīgè rénqù bā ？
Chinese1: 他这么大年纪了，我们总不能让他一个人去吧？
Translate1: He is so old, we can't let him go alone, can we?

Pinyin1: zhèmewǎn le ， zǒng bùhuì chū le shénme shì bā ？
Chinese1: 这么晚了，总不会出了什么事吧？
Translate1: It's so late, nothing will happen, right?

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn shì zǒng bùhuì shì nèibù de rén zuò de bā ？
Chinese1: 这件事总不会是内部的人做的吧？
Translate1: This matter can't be done by internal people, can it?

Pinyin1: tā xiǎng dài fùmǔ qù lǚxíng ， kěshì zǒng méi shíjiān 。
Chinese1: 他想带父母去旅行，可是总没时间。
Translate1: He wanted to take his parents on a trip, but he never had the time.

Pinyin1: wǒ wàng le yùyuē ， zhǐhǎo qù páiduì 。
Chinese1: 我忘了预约，只好去排队。
Translate1: I forgot to make an appointment and had to wait in line.

Pinyin1: tā méiyǒu shíjiān qù ， zhǐhǎo wǒ qù 。
Chinese1: 他没有时间去，只好我去。
Translate1: He didn't have time to go, so I had to go.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn bù gěi wǒ zhǎnggōngzī ， wǒ zhǐhǎo qù gān sīhuó 。
Chinese1: 老板不给我涨工资，我只好去干私活。
Translate1: The boss didn't give me a salary increase, so I had to do private work.

Pinyin1: tā shízài shòubùliǎo nàme chǎonào de línjū ， zhǐhǎo bānzǒu le 。
Chinese1: 她实在受不了那么吵闹的邻居，只好搬走了。
Translate1: She couldn't stand such noisy neighbors, so she had to move away.

Pinyin1: nàtiān tūrán xiàyǔ le ， wǒmen zhǐhǎo qǔxiāo 。
Chinese1: 那天突然下雨了，我们只好取消。
Translate1: It rained suddenly that day and we had to cancel.

Pinyin1: jǐngchá gěi xiǎotōu kàn le jiānkòng ， xiǎotōu zhǐhǎo chéngrèn le 。
Chinese1: 警察给小偷看了监控，小偷只好承认了。
Translate1: The police showed the thief the surveillance, and the thief had to admit it.

Pinyin1: biémà tā le ， tā bìjìng shì háizi 。
Chinese1: 别骂他了，他毕竟是孩子。
Translate1: Don't scold him, he is a child after all.

Pinyin1: bìjìng shì dōngtiān ， nǐ háishi duō chuāndiǎn bā 。
Chinese1: 毕竟是冬天，你还是多穿点吧。
Translate1: After all, it is winter, you should wear more.

Pinyin1: tā bù zhīdào yě hěn zhèngcháng ， bìjìng tā bùshì běndìrén 。
Chinese1: 他不知道也很正常，毕竟他不是本地人。
Translate1: It's normal for him not to know, after all, he is not a local.

Pinyin1: yǒu de wánxiào bùnéng zàikāi le ， bìjìng tāmen dōu shì dà háizi le 。
Chinese1: 有的玩笑不能再开了，毕竟他们都是大孩子了。
Translate1: Some jokes can no longer be made, after all, they are all big kids.

Pinyin1: wǒmen bùtàixiǎng bān ， bìjìng zài zhèr zhù le hǎojǐnián le 。
Chinese1: 我们不太想搬，毕竟在这儿住了好几年了。
Translate1: We don't really want to move because we've lived here for years.

Pinyin1: suīrán tā zuò cuò le ， dàn bìjìng tā háishi xiǎo ， nǐ jiù bié dǎ tā le 。
Chinese1: 虽然他做错了，但毕竟他还是小，你就别打他了。
Translate1: Although he did something wrong, he is still young after all, so don't hit him.

Pinyin1: wǒ chàdiǎnr méi xiǎng qǐlai 。
Chinese1: 我差点儿没想起来。
Translate1: I almost forgot.

Pinyin1: wǒ chàdiǎn méi gǎnshàng huǒchē 。
Chinese1: 我差点没赶上火车。
Translate1: I almost missed the train.

Pinyin1: tā chàdiǎn méi tōngguò kǎoshì 。
Chinese1: 他差点没通过考试。
Translate1: He almost failed the exam.

Pinyin1: páiduì de réntàiduō le ， chàdiǎnr méimǎi dào 。
Chinese1: 排队的人太多了，差点儿没买到。
Translate1: There were so many people in line that I almost didn't get it.

Pinyin1: bùguǎn tā qùbùqù ， fǎnzhèng wǒyào qù 。
Chinese1: 不管他去不去，反正我要去。
Translate1: Whether he goes or not, I'm going anyway.

Pinyin1: bùguǎn nǐ xìnbùxìn ， fǎnzhèng wǒxìn 。
Chinese1: 不管你信不信，反正我信。
Translate1: Believe it or not, I do.

Pinyin1: bùguǎn tā bàba shì shéi ， fǎnzhèng wǒ yàogào tā 。
Chinese1: 不管他爸爸是谁，反正我要告他。
Translate1: Whoever his father is, I'm going to sue him anyway.

Pinyin1: suíbiàn biéren zěnme xiǎng ， fǎnzhèng wǒ wúsuǒwèi 。
Chinese1: 随便别人怎么想，反正我无所谓。
Translate1: Whatever other people think, I don't care anyway.

Pinyin1: shuō bù shuō dōu yīyàng ， fǎnzhèng méiyǒu rénhuì tīng wǒ de 。
Chinese1: 说不说都一样，反正没有人会听我的。
Translate1: It doesn't matter if you say it or not, no one will listen to me anyway.

Pinyin1: fǎnzhèng tāmen bùlái le ， zánmen zìjǐ qù bā 。
Chinese1: 反正他们不来了，咱们自己去吧。
Translate1: Anyway, they're not coming, so let's go by ourselves.

Pinyin1: fǎnzhèng wǒ yě bù xūyào ， jiù sònggěi nǐ bā 。
Chinese1: 反正我也不需要，就送给你吧。
Translate1: I don't need it anyway, so I'll give it to you.

Pinyin1: fǎnzhèng wǒjiā gòu dà ， nǐmen jīnwǎn dōu zhù zhèr bā 。
Chinese1: 反正我家够大，你们今晚都住这儿吧。
Translate1: Anyway, my house is big enough, you all live here tonight.

Pinyin1: fǎnzhèng dàjiā dōu zhīdào le ， nǐ huán pà shénme ？
Chinese1: 反正大家都知道了，你还怕什么？
Translate1: Anyway, everyone knows it, so what are you afraid of?

Pinyin1: fǎnzhèng kěyǐ shuākǎ ， méiyǒu xiànjīn méishénme dàbùliǎo de 。
Chinese1: 反正可以刷卡，没有现金没什么大不了的。
Translate1: Anyway, you can swipe your card, no cash is no big deal.

Pinyin1: wǒhuì jìnliàng xiǎng bànfǎ bāng nǐ de 。
Chinese1: 我会尽量想办法帮你的。
Translate1: I'll do my best to help you.

Pinyin1: nǐ kànshū bā ， wǒ jìnliàng bù dǎrǎo nǐ 。
Chinese1: 你看书吧，我尽量不打扰你。
Translate1: You read, I will try not to disturb you.

Pinyin1: fùmǔ yīnggāi jìnliàng duō péipéi háizi 。
Chinese1: 父母应该尽量多陪陪孩子。
Translate1: Parents should spend as much time with their children as possible.

Pinyin1: nǐ shì gēge ， yào jìnliàng zhàogu hǎo mèimei 。
Chinese1: 你是哥哥，要尽量照顾好妹妹。
Translate1: You are an older brother, try to take good care of your younger sister.

Pinyin1: tāmen hǎobùróngyì cái pá dào le shāndǐng ， jiéguǒ xiàqǐ le dàyǔ 。
Chinese1: 他们好不容易才爬到了山顶，结果下起了大雨。
Translate1: They climbed to the top of the mountain with difficulty, and it rained heavily.

Pinyin1: yào wánchéng zhège dà xiàngmù hǎobùróngyì a 。
Chinese1: 要完成这个大项目好不容易啊。
Translate1: It's not easy to complete this big project.

Pinyin1: yǎng dà yīgè háizi hǎobùróngyì 。
Chinese1: 养大一个孩子好不容易。
Translate1: Raising a child is not easy.

Pinyin1: chuàngbàn yīgè gōngsī hǎobùróngyì a 。
Chinese1: 创办一个公司好不容易啊。
Translate1: It's hard to start a company.

Pinyin1: dàjiā yǒuhuà jǐnguǎn shuō 。
Chinese1: 大家有话尽管说。
Translate1: Everyone has something to say.

Pinyin1: yǒu shénme wèntí jǐnguǎn wèn 。
Chinese1: 有什么问题尽管问。
Translate1: Feel free to ask any questions.

Pinyin1: yǒu shénme shì jǐnguǎn zhǎo wǒ 。
Chinese1: 有什么事尽管找我。
Translate1: If you need anything, just come to me.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē yǐnliào shì miǎnfèi de ， jǐnguǎn hē 。
Chinese1: 这些饮料是免费的，尽管喝。
Translate1: These drinks are free, go ahead and drink.

Pinyin1: xiǎng chī shénme jǐnguǎn diǎn ， wǒ qǐngkè 。
Chinese1: 想吃什么尽管点，我请客。
Translate1: Just order whatever you want, I'll treat you.

Pinyin1: wǒmen dōu shì dǎgōng de ， bùdébù fúcóng gōngsī de ānpái 。
Chinese1: 我们都是打工的，不得不服从公司的安排。
Translate1: We are all part-time workers and have to obey the company's arrangements.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhēnde tài lìhai le ， wǒ bùdébù chéngrèn 。
Chinese1: 你真的太厉害了，我不得不承认。
Translate1: You are really amazing, I have to admit.

Pinyin1: diàntī yòuhuàile ， wǒmen bùdébù pálóutī 。
Chinese1: 电梯又坏了，我们不得不爬楼梯。
Translate1: The lift was broken again and we had to climb the stairs.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhēnhuì shuōhuà ， zhè yīdiǎn wǒmen bùdébù pèifú 。
Chinese1: 你真会说话，这一点我们不得不佩服。
Translate1: You can really speak, which we have to admire.

Pinyin1: bùhǎoyìsi ， shíjiān yǒuxiàn ， wǒ bùdébù dǎduàn nǐ 。
Chinese1: 不好意思，时间有限，我不得不打断你。
Translate1: Sorry, time is limited, I have to interrupt you.

Pinyin1: jiālǐ shénme dōu méiyǒu ， gāncuì chūqù chī bā 。
Chinese1: 家里什么都没有，干脆出去吃吧。
Translate1: I don't have anything at home, so let's go out to eat.

Pinyin1: jìrán xué bùhǎo ， gāncuì biéxué le 。
Chinese1: 既然学不好，干脆别学了。
Translate1: If you can't learn well, don't learn at all.

Pinyin1: zhètái pò diànnǎo yòuhuàile ， gāncuì biéxiū le ， mǎitái xīn de bā 。
Chinese1: 这台破电脑又坏了，干脆别修了，买台新的吧。
Translate1: This broken computer is broken again, just don't fix it, buy a new one.

Pinyin1: píngguǒ hěn guì ， wǒ gāncuì méimǎi ， zhǐ mǎi le diǎn xiāngjiāo 。
Chinese1: 苹果很贵，我干脆没买，只买了点香蕉。
Translate1: Apples are very expensive, so I didn't buy them at all, I just bought some bananas.

Pinyin1: jīhū měige rén dōu yǒu shǒujī 。
Chinese1: 几乎每个人都有手机。
Translate1: Almost everyone has a mobile phone.

Pinyin1: zài wǒmen gōngsī ， jīhū měige rén dōu huì shuō yīngwén 。
Chinese1: 在我们公司，几乎每个人都会说英文。
Translate1: In our company, almost everyone can speak English.

Pinyin1: jīhū suǒyǒurén dōu xiāngxìn tā 。
Chinese1: 几乎所有人都相信他。
Translate1: Almost everyone believed him.

Pinyin1: jīhū quánshìjiè de guānzhòng dōu xǐhuan zhèbù diànyǐng 。
Chinese1: 几乎全世界的观众都喜欢这部电影。
Translate1: Almost audiences all over the world love this movie.

Pinyin1: bàba de tóufa jīhū bái le 。
Chinese1: 爸爸的头发几乎白了。
Translate1: Dad's hair is almost white.

Pinyin1: zhècì lǚxíng ， tāmen jīhū huā le suǒyǒu de qián 。
Chinese1: 这次旅行，他们几乎花了所有的钱。
Translate1: They spent nearly all their money on this trip.

Pinyin1: tā yīgè rén jīhū chī le yī zhěnggè dàngāo 。
Chinese1: 他一个人几乎吃了一整个蛋糕。
Translate1: He ate almost an entire cake by himself.

Pinyin1: wǒ lǎobǎn jīhū bù hējiǔ 。
Chinese1: 我老板几乎不喝酒。
Translate1: My boss barely drinks alcohol.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn zhè jǐge yuè jīhū méi hǎohǎo xiūxi guò 。
Chinese1: 老板这几个月几乎没好好休息过。
Translate1: The boss has hardly had a good rest in the past few months.
